posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Harry Niles and Harry Lord
posts.post_content:

Jay

I found the Niles thanks to this awesome board!

I'm still looking for a Harry Lord EPDG or Polar Bear.

I prefer raw, but SGC would be fine as well.
